title: Sandro Ramirez joins Sevilla on loan from Everton
description: Everton striker Sandro Ramirez has completed his loan move to Sevilla just six months after signing from Malaga.
content: Everton announced the deal on Tuesday night with the 22-year-old forward passing his medical on Wednesday morning to seal the move.The Spain U21 international will spend the rest of the season on loan with the La Liga side.He was signed by former Everton manager Ronald Koeman for £5.25m last summer but failed to hold down a place in the first team under either Koeman or his replacement, Sam Allardyce.Ramirez played 15 games in all competitions for the Toffees this season, scoring one goal.His last game came in the 0-0 draw with Chelsea on December 23 and he will now have the opportunity to impress back in Spain, having scored 16 times in 31 appearances for Malaga last season.Get Sky Sports from £18 a month and watch the latest transfers live in action for their new teams
